casebody.data:
IRVING-PITT MFG. CO. v. TWINLOCK CO. (McMILLAN BOOK CO., Intervener). (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. July 26, 1915.) No. 259. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for tire Southern District of New York. William W. Dodge, of New York City (F. P. Fish, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. John C. Pennie, of New York City, for appellee.

Before LACOMBE, WARD, and ROGERS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed, with costs, on the opinion below (220 Fed. 325).
